Rulings.Base:
1. Tributing this card is a cost.
2. This effect targets the face-up WATER monster.
3. You can target your opponent's WATER monster.
4. If the target is not face-up on the field when the effect resolves, you cannot destroy it and you cannot add an "Ice Barrier" monster to your hand.
5. Destroying the WATER monster and adding an "Ice Barrier" monster to your hand happen simultaneously.
6. If you have no "Ice Barrier" monsters in your Deck, you cannot activate this effect.
